#Dependeies

```{r}
update.packages(ask = FALSE)
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("rlang")
install.packages("writexl")
library(writexl)
library(dplyr)
```

#Importing dataset

```{r}
nc_voter_db <- read.delim("./history_stats_20240305.txt", sep = "\t")

```


# Filter by only HL
```{r}
nc_voter_db
colnames(nc_voter_db)
HL_ncvoter <- filter(nc_voter_db, ethnic_code == "HL")
```


# Filter by voted_party_cd (party primary) only HL
```{r}
HL_ncvoter_DEM <- filter(HL_ncvoter, voted_party_cd == "DEM")
HL_ncvoter_REP <- filter(HL_ncvoter, voted_party_cd == "REP")
```


# Export to excel
```{r}
write_xlsx(HL_ncvoter, "filter-hispanic-voters.xlsx")
```
